sentences.en: A megawatt is an instantaneous measure of power.
sentences.cn: 一兆瓦是电力的瞬间衡量指标。

sentences.en: As the renewable technologies continued to mature, the report added, the cost per megawatt (MW) continued to fall.
sentences.cn: 报道又说，因为可再生能源技术不断走向成熟，每兆瓦（MW）的成本继续下跌。

sentences.en: Company profits in 2008 year - on - year revenue growth, become main fan - megawatt class.
sentences.cn: 公司2008年收入利润 同比 大幅增长, 兆瓦级风机渐成主力.

sentences.en: It is the power behind a 880 megawatt hydroelectric generating station.
sentences.cn: 它是一座880百万瓦水力发电站的主要动力来源.

sentences.en: Now everywhere Charlotte went her megawatt smile drew crowds.
sentences.cn: 无论走到哪里,夏洛特迷人的微笑吸引了大批观众.

sentences.en: Still, there is not a single megawatt of EGS-produced power on line yet, and, at best, it will be quite a while before it becomes a significant energy source.
sentences.cn: 不过，EGS还没能向电网输送哪怕是一兆瓦的电力，就是按最好情况算，它要成为主要的能源来源还很需要一些时日。

sentences.en: The contract involves construction, commissioning and fuel loads for four 1,400 megawatt plants.
sentences.cn: 合同涉及4座发电量分别为1400兆瓦的核电站的建造 、 运营和燃料负载工作.

trans.tran_cn: 兆瓦，百万瓦特（电能计量单位）
